text: Iyakuba balalenah he amara batsagana! Saba'i eka'i prabesadbara diye yeyo na, baram prthaka prthaka daraja diye prabesa karo. Allahara kona bidhana theke ami tomaderake raksa karate pari na. Nirdesa allahara'i cale. Tamra'i upara ami bharasa kari ebam tamra'i upara bharasa kara ucita bharasakaridera.
